{{Terminology Infobox
|type         = Genshin Impact
|type2        = Video Types
}}
'''Collected Miscellany''' are videos released by official Genshin Impact media that demonstrate and explain characters' skills in the game. They are usually narrated by [[Dainsleif]], with the exception of [[Aloy]], [[Dori]], and [[Wanderer]]'s videos narrated by [[Alice]] and [[Sigewinne]]'s video narrated by [[Neuvillette]]. They are available as a [https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLqWr7dyJNgLKLO-Zpw9muZ9NnC0TyOpij playlist] on the official Genshin Impact YouTube channel.

==Videos==
{{Files by Category Gallery|Collected Miscellany}}

==Featured==
===Characters and Weapons===
Guest characters are playable characters other than the featured one that appear in the video, usually to demonstrate supportive skills and synergies with the featured character.
